extendedInfo.description: Become a legend of justice in the new role-playing game inspired by The Lone Ranger movie!Saddle up and take the reins as one of the greatest Texas Rangers in the Wild West. Embark on a thrilling adventure as you protect the town of Colby, face-off in epic showdowns, and bring infamous outlaws to justice. Fight against greed and corruption in this 3d, role-playing adventure!Â·      Interact with known allies and outlaws throughout your journey: With allies like the Lone Ranger and Tonto on your side, prepare to take on the villainous Butch Cavendish and his unwieldy gang.Â·      Restore peace to the town of Colby: Protect the citizens of Colby, and embark on legendary quests to end greed and corruption.Â·      Duel outlaws and bandits: Face-off against wanted outlaws with your best weapons and equipment, and bring them to justice.  Â·      Level-up to unlock new weapons, tools, and horses to aide you on your journey.Â·      More languages coming soon! Play The Lone Ranger in Italian, German, and Spanish starting late July.Remember to check out The Lone Ranger in a theater near you; check your local listings for showtimes!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: awesome game
reviews.comment: just started to play, it looks awesome and easy to use start downloading the game and join in the fun, free to use my promocode for some extra silver ;) kjsz35
reviews.author: R. Hardy

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: Good story with lots to do in order to advance, very cool for a phone game. Can\'t wait for the updates!
reviews.author: Gerri Ledent

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Nice game,great grafics and cool updates.
reviews.author: Omer Miraj

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: I really enjoy the game its fun to play the graphics are pretty good to and I\'d recommend this game to anyone
reviews.author: Roy Ramey

reviews.title: ok needs to be fixed an updated
reviews.comment: overall its a ok game good game play bit hard rasing money unless u sit there and keep investing in the bank then timer dont always count down or your money just goes into thin air im  now at point where it says scout about to find next mission I\'ve searched for days still no luck .. also when dueling its started not registering when i shoot
reviews.author: tristan tullett

reviews.comment: Difficult to play on an android for a juvenile.  Not very well explained, the legend and various activities.  Looks like it would take a while to accumulate enough points to advance.  I think a lot of players would give up.
reviews.author: Karen Gonzalez

reviews.title: It drives me crazy
reviews.comment: Everytime i try to shoot  someone when i press it and my thing just doesn\'t move at all i did in the beggining but now it just doesn\'t work right . Please fix j
reviews.author: anie sweet

reviews.title: Game Can\'t install and crashes
reviews.comment: Spent the better half of the afternoon trying to download the game but it says server not available and keeps crashing now when I open the game to try reload...  Tried downloading twice now
reviews.author: Tony Aires

reviews.title: Xoom 2
reviews.comment: Been playing for a couple of hours not to bad but you have to work it out as you go as no instructions which may put ppl off, gets better as you get further into the game and work out whats going on and how to play.

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: All it says is resolution is not supported on my device so now I cant play the game

reviews.title: Every time needs internet
reviews.comment: Plz Disney ur top developer this games worth 5 star by every one but plz fix it because no one every time on internet connection plz fix it and me my friends and entire fans of Disney will give 5 star ratings

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Lots of crashes/hangups when the connection is broken. Also when crashing it placed a \"burn in\" image in my screen of the game itself across 50% of the screen surface.. had to reboot. Galaxy S4
reviews.author: Lord Anton Hvornum

reviews.title: The lone ranger.
reviews.comment: Not much of a good game as everything cost way too much money and it helps if the game dos\'nt go into loading mode when im in the middle of a duel as i ended up losing yet again as i could not to  f  all !!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: Screenshots are great
reviews.comment: So couldn\'t wait to download started the game up and oh look an error (screen resolution on this phone is not supported well thanks for letting me know but make sure its before i download next time. Galaxy Ace

reviews.comment: Anyone, can u help me..? When i tried, the notification always \"the server is not accessible, please try again\". It\'s always like that although i\'d uninstall n installing again.

reviews.comment: But so far so good. Could speed up energy refills and half the effort needed for help but, all in all, a good game thus far in...

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I really like the game play and the design and graphics. It\'s a winner in my book

reviews.comment: Its not working on my xperia go... Tells me graphics not supported in your device  Hope u solve the problem

reviews.title: Games messing up
reviews.comment: I started the game and it downloaded what it needed to eben start the game and I can\'t see the gameplay. Its flashimg black and white. I\'m glad my husband didnt try and play it becsuse he wpuld have had a seziure. If it\'s not fixed soon I will unistall it.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It is ok for a play every now and then but I think it would be so so much better if you could actually ride on the horses then I\'d give it a 4 star
